items.degree: Higher Technician in Web Application Development
items.description: Comprehensive training in frontend and backend development. GPA: 9.25
Higher education in criminology, focused on analysis, prevention, and security management.

Development of an application in Go integrating the Google Drive API. Implemented features: file and folder visualization; manual or bulk download (ZIP) of files and folders via links; manual and bulk file upload. Team collaboration following best practices in version control (Git) and technical documentation.

Currently preparing store orders using a picking system. Organizing and assembling pallets with requested products. Verifying quantity and quality before shipping. Use of electric pallet truck. Meeting time and quality standards in a dynamic logistics environment.

Team management: scheduling, hiring processes, staff follow-up, and talent identification. Analysis of profit and loss accounts to ensure store profitability. Team coordination and motivation to meet objectives on time. Monitoring and analysis of KPIs.

Store responsibility: opening, closing, and cash reconciliation. Team management and customer service. Responsible for the footwear section, applying visual merchandising techniques to boost sales and ensure proper commercial presentation. Incident management, team training, and organization.
Customer service throughout the sales process. Product handling in the retail sector: tagging, processing, and placement both in-store and in the stockroom. Use of POS system and cross-selling.

Customer service, order preparation, and bar and dining area service. Kitchen support, restocking, and inventory control. Cleaning and maintenance of the workspace. Teamwork under pressure, meeting quality standards and service times in a fast casual restaurant environment.

items: Interest in web development and new technologies
